job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pThe ideal candidate will be responsible for developing highquality applications They will also be responsible for designing and implementing testable and scalable codenbspppnbspppstrongResponsibilitiesstrongppExperience Band 510 years Software EngineerspulliExtremely proficient in Embedded C bare metal device driver development board bring up and BSPlow level closer to hardware platform software developmentliliExpertise in BSP and drivers for at least one or more of the following  PCIeUSBUFSNAND Exposure to Linux drivers is nice to have but not mandatoryliliBeyond the driver software a deep protocol level understanding of one or more of the following USBUFSPCIe is expectedliliGood knowledge on MicroprocessorsMicrocontrollers  ARM MPU ARMv7ARMv8 architecturesliliShould have experience in Linux Internals or RTOS IPC Message Queues Shared memory Semaphores multithreading Mutex etcliliFamiliarity with Open source Linux Kernel and development practicesliliHands on experience with lab instruments like oscilloscopes waveforms analyzers LauterbachJTAG is a plusliliA selfmanaged individual with excellent problemsolving skillsliul
